input.sentences: the grounds the school were on were vast .
kids liked to eat their meals outside .
the birds flew over the school often .
the city was glad to have such a modern school for the children .
output.sentences: I went on a tour of my new school today, which is huge and very hygienic looking and resembles a well-kept mall.
The grounds are neat enough to play golf on and the area has lots of walking trails and places to picnic.
The cafeteria was modern, with glossy floors and artwork and places to buy trays of food, under blue awnings.
I decided to take a sandwich outdoors and I saw birds wheeling their way across a deep blue sky.
Someone else with the same idea was standing and looking out over the water and I was glad about my choice.
